channel.title: Can anyone tell me
channel.description:
How to change it so that my admins can trade with each other? Because right now it says 'Admins cannot trade' when they try to. Also, can anyone tell me how to change the position of the jail?
Thanks so much!,
Noobinator

item.title: Can anyone tell me
item.dc:creator: @tajkillerscape tajkillerscape
item.description:
@tajkillerscape wrote:

I belive it’s this one. if(other.interfaceOpened){ int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absX; int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absY; TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY); sM("Other player is busy at the moment."); return; } if(action == 1){ return; } if(other.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)){ sM("Other player is busy at the moment."); return; } if(other.action == 1){ return; } if(other.playerRights == 2){ sM("Admins cannot trade."); return; } if(playerRights == 2){ sM("Admins cannot trade."); return; }

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone tell me
item.dc:creator: @Noobinator9907 Noobinator9907
item.description:
@Noobinator9907 wrote:

item.title: Can anyone tell me
item.dc:creator: @Maxammus Maxammus
item.description:
@Maxammus wrote:

Open up client.java and search for ‘Admins cannot trade’, you should find the code that’s not allowing you to trade and delete it.

As for jail get yourself sent to the jail, don’t move, and find your x and y coords, i can’t tell you exactly how since i’m not familiar with the server you have, search the coords in client.java and replace them with the coords of where you want players to be teleported to when they get jailed.

Read full topic
